

Formatting Tests

2.2.1, 2.2.1, B.B.A, ;2;2;1, B.B.A=, *2*2*1*, B 2 A, B.2.1, =, .., Second Author
3.1.1, 3.1.1, C.A.A, ;3;1;1, C.A.A=, *3*1*1*, C 1 A, C.1.1, =, ..,  Robinson
3.1.2.1, 3.1.2.1, C.A.B.A, ;3;1;2;1, C.A.B.A=, *3*1*2*1*, C 1 B 1, C.1.2.1, =, ..,  Robinson
